name: Daydream (itch) (N.S. Dawn)
description:
Aug 9, 2020:

This is a platformer I started making for the Can't Write Game Jam. This project is really important to me, but due to unforeseen circumstances these last two weeks, I wasn't able to get the amount of work done on it that I planned to. Nonetheless, I am releasing this first part of the game as a demo, and would love to get feedback on it.

Yes, it's enby. 

Stay tuned for updates!
